channel.title: Livin The Dream
channel.itunes:subtitle: A weekly program about entrepreneurship, franchising and business ownership. ST
channel.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
channel.itunes:summary: Livin The Dream is hosted by Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege who are both successful business and franchise owners. They specialize in helping coach their clients understand which direction for business ownership is right for them. Leo and Sybil also assist their client in each step of the process of researching their business and getting started successfully. Join them each week on Tuesdays at Noon CT.
channel.description: Livin The Dream is hosted by Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege who are both successful business and franchise owners. They specialize in helping coach their clients understand which direction for business ownership is right for them. Leo and Sybil also assist their client in each step of the process of researching their business and getting started successfully. Join them each week on Tuesdays at Noon CT.

item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Ian Stevenson of Whoast Inc about internet marketing including search engine optimization, pay per click campaigns, email marketing and SEO analytics.

item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Mary Erlain of Samurai Business Group about the difference between selling and helping a prospect to buy your product or services.

item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Becky Dzielinski of Arbonne International about some of the advantages and challenges of Direct Sales and Multi-Level Marketing.

item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Tom Gosche of Business Network International (BNI) about specific networking tips to improve the effectiveness of your networking.

item.itunes:subtitle: Kevin Brown - Servpro
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Kevin Brown of Servpro about the Servpro franchise as well as the great opportunities for expansion in the Chicago market.

item.title: Minorities in Business
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Harriet Parker - Illinois Small Business Development Center and Karen Christensen - City of Aurora
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Harriet Parker of the Illinois Small Business Development Center and Karen Christensen of the City of Aurora talk about some of the unique challenges minorities face when they decide to go into business for themselves.

item.title: Starting your own business: Its not enough just to file the forms
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Nancy Paluch Tassi and Christine E. Righeimer of Righeimer and Tassi, P.C.
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Nancy Paluch Tassi and Christine E. Righeimer of Righeimer and Tassi, P.C. what you need to do from a legal perspective AFTER you file the initial paperwork to establish your business.

item.title: Making Profits In a Non-Profit World
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Donovan Robertson - Olikim Consulting
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Donovan Robertson of Olikim Consulting about how to leverage for-profit businesses as a way to help fund a non-profit business.

item.title: Job change after 50 AND Competition - is it good or bad?
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Jim Spalding - AIM Mail Centers and Jeff Shaw - Dry Cleaning Station
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Jim Spalding - AIM Mail Centers and Jeff Shaw - Dry Cleaning Station about changing careers at 50 as well as dealing with competition in their competitive industries.

item.title: Valuing Net Worth and Self Worth
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Jim Blaha - Author, Educator and Entrepreneur
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Jim Blaha - Author, Educator and Entrepreneur about his facinating journey into self-discovery and how it has helped him in his endevors as an entrepreneur.

item.title: Determining Area Economics
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Theresa Fawcett of the City of St Charles
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Theresa Fawcett of the City of St Charles about how anyone can leverage her office to learn about a wide array of economics facts about the St Charles, IL area. Economic Development offices are available all across the country at the city, county and even state levels.

item.title: Hiring and Retaining Employees - Real Life Experience
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Barb Wisniewski a Great Clips Franchisee
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Barb Wisniewski a Great Clips franchisee about her real life experience of hiring and retaining staff at her Great Clips salons.

item.title: What Keeps You Up at Night as a Business Owner?
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Ellen Huxtable of Advantage Business Concepts
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Ellen Huxtable of Advantage Business Concepts about some of the common things that keep a business owner up at night. We also cover some of the key things you can do to address these items and get a good night's rest.

item.title: New Career Economy
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Steve Rosenkrantz of The Entrepreneur's Source
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege of Livin' The Dream talk with Steve Rosenkrantz of The Entrepreneur's Source about a recent comprehensive study comissioned by The Entrepreneur's Source about the state of job market in the economy.

item.title: Real Estate Investing
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Jeff Thoreson of GSF Mortgage
item.itunes:summary: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege talk with Jeff Thoreson of GSF Mortgage about real estate investing. There is a lot of hype about real estate investing. Jeff shares some straight talk about how real estate investing REALLY works.

item.title: The Entrepreneurial Mindset
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Leo Wisniewski and Sybili of The Enprepreneur's Source.
item.itunes:summary: Leo and Sybil talk about one of the critical keys to success in having your own business - having an "entrepreneurial" mindset. Leo and Sybil talk about what this mindset is and is not.

item.title: Virtual Professionals
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Sue Kramer of Peace of Mind Virtual Assistance and Peter Birren of Birren Design.
item.itunes:summary: How to leverage virtual professionals in your business - specifically virtual assistants and graphics designers.

item.title: Marketing Budgets and Planning
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Jim Kendall of 121 Marketing Resources.
item.itunes:summary: 10 practical steps when you are putting together your marketing budget and marketing plan.

item.title: Business Partnerships
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Brian Marshall and Gene Rosendale of Alliance for Strategic Advantage.
item.itunes:summary: Tips on how to form a successful business partnership

item.title: Women In Business
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Sara Bittenbender, the publisher of Single Edge Magazine.
item.itunes:summary: Interview with a successful woman entrepreneur and business owner.

item.title: Goal Setting and Productivity
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Steve Harap of Partners for Productivity
item.itunes:summary: Setting and keeing on track with your goals.

item.title: Payroll Processing
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Joni Carpenter of Paychex.
item.itunes:summary: What to look for in a payroll processor.

item.title: Credit Card Processing and Business Banking
item.itunes:author: Leo Wisniewski and Sybil Ege
item.itunes:subtitle: Todd Cox of MLS Direct and Linda Swanson of Park National Bank
item.itunes:summary: How to find a good credit card processor for your business and what can be offerred by your business banker.
